title: Why does teemo do half your health just by pressing q.
body: y is that allowed in game. At least with mf it make minions target her

replies.body:
*builds no defense*

*wonders why teemo is doing so much damage*

lol he dont do half your health by pressing Q 

WTF are you people smoking
It's a fed Teemo vs a lowlvl ADC without MR man. Don't ya see what he means? Kappa

lol oh ok ... 

my bad 

IM THE ONE WHO IS UNREALISTIC HERE
It's not even so unrealistic in my elo lately. I have seen some things. God, I even miss the shithole gold 5 was xd.

> [{quoted}](name=MrFawknSunshine ,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=4z9aYb5E,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-02-04T18:55:52.672+0000)
>
> lol he dont do half your health by pressing Q 
> 
> WTF are you people smoking

{{champion:17}} {{item:3020}} {{item:3136}}

ok so his Q takes half hp with just those items? 

let assume he is running attack speed reds, ap quints, and went 18-12-0 

and considering he normally will start a dorans ring... and those items would put him around lvl 7 giving him 4 points in his Q 

so its a 215 +80% ap 

he has 15ap from runes {{item:1056}} 15 from this item and {{item:3136}} 25 from  this and if he took natural talent giving him another 8 ap 

so we have 63ap 

80% of 63 is 50.4 so 50ap 

215+50=265 magic damage on hit prior to magic pen... and magic resist 

if 265 ap is doing half your hp then you have 530 hp at lvl 7 in the game

Teemo is unlikely going to get into range to Q you without even accidentally auto-attacking you just from the ai grabbing a nearby target. So at least toss one auto in there with a toxic dot proc just to make it a more conservative scenario. My suggestion and 2 cents. Though if its a good teemo I still believe this person is probably experiencing the full combo of auto,q,auto,thunderlords. I duhwunnado math. but seems that would do similar to what the dude may be experiencing. :P

but its NOT 1 Q 

its alot of dps with DOT

On paper that is true, ingame though that combo is so fast you may not process it all. I can excuse a person who don't play teemo or play against him often or watch stuff back at .5 speed to think what the heck. nerf pls.
Teemo is the devil.

If it makes you feel any better, at least it isn't: Flash, Deathfire-Grasp(DFG) Active, Q, Ignite Teemo. I unfortunately had to lane mid vs that when that item existed. Never felt so bad in a teemo matchup, he had a mid-camping jungle kha'zix too and warded me out, and shrooms everywhere. If I tried to go ward something I'd hit a shroom and get one shot by kha'zix.

Since his Q resets his auto attacks, he has nice quick little combo. auto attack, Q, (attack reset), auto attack, thunderlord's proc. Nice quick combo. Doing all that doesn't take much longer than the just pressing the Q. 

It is possible he is doing this, and if not then he is not doing as much as he could be doing in similar timeframe.
it doesn't reset your auto, the animation is just so slow your next aa is ready after

http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Basic_attack this site page mentions that it resets the basic attack, but 'resets' is listed like that, prob meaning it cancels the remainder of the auto attack animation (The concept as much as i know if it, is that the 2nd half of the first auto's animation is canceled, the spell used to do that is full length and the 2nd auto after that is full length. Though i dunno much on this subject honestly), supposedly a lot of spells do that, you do have to wait till the spell you are using to finish before you can auto attack again though but the actual wikia page on teemo when popping the more info doesn't list the Q as an auto attack reset. searching google has some sites listing it as an auto attack reset, and some people asking why other people think it is as they say that it is not. I dunno. but I have played him on minor occasions and it 'feels' to me that it is resetting the autoattack timer even if it is not. It feels same as darius auto, w, auto to me. I don't play either of them often or hardly at all. It has always felt like a reset. there are others who say it is one. I think if it cancels any part of an animation at end of one auto or at beginning of another it is at least a partial reset. guess there are true resets and partial resets in that a normal riven doesn't auto attack as fast as an animation canceling riven, her spells aren't true resets but a person that uses them to cancel animations is effectively increasing her autoattack speed and murdering people. teemo's q may not be a true reset but i don't know the answer, it sure as heck feels like one. :)

p.s. supposedly tiamat active resets autos to and i think even the wikia page says it does, but seen arguments similar to what you make saying that it really doesn't. This may be one of those things :P.

the same reason lux is allowed to.
the same reason zed is allowed to. 
comes with having big skills with big damage.
